GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
KVM: s390: pv: leak the topmost page table when destroy fails

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 63c71e83d5b6ab8adb5fcebef977052048016957, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit 29b40f105ec8d555984c1f72dc9133b122e51903. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: KVM: s390: pv: leak the topmost page table when destroy fails
